name: MLTextClassifier.DataSource
desc: A data source for a text classifier.

items.name: case labeledDirectories(at: URL)
items.desc: A root directory of labeled directories for your data set.

items.name: func labeledTexts() -> [String : [String]]
items.desc: Fetches the labeled data from the data source.

items.name: func stratifiedSplit(proportions: [Double], seed: Int, labelColumn: String, textColumn: String) -> MLDataTable
items.desc: Generates a data table by splitting the data source into strata.
